text: A te, u kotorykh net vozmozhnosti sochetat'sya brakom, pust' soblyudayut tselomudriye, poka Allakh ne obespechit ikh dostatkom ot Svoikh shchedrot. A yesli kto-libo iz vashikh nevol'nikov prosit gramotu ob otpushchenii na volyu, to vydavayte im yeye, yesli vy nakhodite v nikh dobroye nachalo, i odarite ikh iz imushchestva, kotoroye Allakh daroval vam. Svoikh nevol'nits, yesli oni sklonny k tselomudriyu, ne prinuzhdayte predavat'sya rasputstvu radi priobreteniya mirskikh blag. Yesli zhe kto-libo prinudit ikh [k rasputstvu], to Allakh posle prinuzhdeniya ikh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy [k nevol'nitsam]
